AgreementVoting(address,uint256,uint256,.details: This is when a user votes for a publishing agreement

params.agreementId: This is the id of the publishing agreement that is linked to this ballot
params.ballotId: Id of the ballot where voting is stored
params.vote: State of vote : true for yes and false for No

BallotResult(uint256,uint256,bool).details: this event is generated when result of a ballot is declared

params.agreementId: This is the id of the agreement that is linked to this ballot
params.ballotId: this is the ballot Id for which result is declared
params.result: this is the status of the result //either true if user won that is he received more than 66% of votes or false if user lost

castVoteForAgreement(uint256,bool).details: This function is called by any user to cast vote

params.agreementId: this is the id of the agreement for which user is voting
params.vote: this is the state of the vote, if true than it means the vote is in favour of the ballot

claimRoyaltyAmount(uint256).details: This function is for testing purpose for distributing the royalty payment

createAgreement(uint256,string,string).details: This function will create a new agreement voting ballot

declareWinner(uint256).details: This function can be called from external source and also from within the contract

params.agreementId: this is the id of the agreement of which the winner is to be decleared

payRoyaltyAmount(uint256,uint256).details: This function is for testing purpose for distributing the royalty payment

setOrderContractAddress(address).details: This function sets the treasury Contract address

setTreasuryContractAddress(address).details: This function sets the treasury Contract address

transferRoyaltyPayment(uint256).details: This function can be called from external source and also from within the contract

params.agreementId: this is the id of the agreement of which the winner is to be declared
